channel.title: CVE Feed for SoundCloud Inc., Lawrie Malen -- SoundCloud Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SoundCloud Inc., Lawrie Malen -- SoundCloud Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2024-25936|2024-06-04T17:35:15.598Z -- soundcloud%20inc.%2C%20lawrie%20malen -- soundcloud%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoundCloud Inc., Lawrie Malen SoundCloud Shortcode allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SoundCloud Shortcode: from n/a through 4.0.1.
